attributes.description: Identifier of the distinct terminology from which the code_string (or its elements) was extracted.
attributes.name: terminology_id

attributes.description: The key used by the terminology service to identify a concept or coordination of concepts. This string is most likely parsable inside the terminology service, but nothing can be assumed about its syntax outside that context.
attributes.name: code_string

attributes.description: Optional attribute to carry preferred term corresponding to the code or expression in `_code_string_`. Typical use in integration situations which create mappings, and representing data for which both a (non-preferred) actual term and a preferred term are both required.
attributes.name: preferred_term

meta_info.description: A fully coordinated (i.e. all coordination has been performed) term from a terminology service (as distinct from a particular terminology).
meta_info.name: CODE_PHRASE
